trends: There have been no other sightings in Crescent Lake Junction
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very large/bright/white light. Seemed to be in atmo lower than clouds. ?Venus/Saturn?
divs: sighting detailsufo sighting 05-10-10, 9:50-10:30ish pm., conditions: clear\cold\calm; good visibility; stars clearly visible, no moon; altitude 4800'; no sound or vibration; no visible strobe; no red\green wing lghts.; other distant aircraft clearly visible & identifiable my location: odell lake viewpoint, hwy. 58 (milepost 65.5), willamette pass, deschutes national forest (oregon cascades), crescent lake junction, klamath county, or 97733. ufo location: wnw (from my loc.); northern tip of diamond peak wilderness>tumbledown creek fire site> hills creek reservoir> witnesses: 4 adults "approx. 9;45 pm, leaving manley's tavern (crscnt. lk. jct.), we noticed an unusually bright light wnw 'hanging' fairly low on the horizon>continued to track it as we drove home to cabin (approx. 3 miles)>light appeared stable\constant\stationary>the closer we drove towards it; the clearer & nearer our view>pulled over at viewpoint, got out to see it over the lake (well above hills\lake\distant cabin lights, etc; used those as reference points)>had time to run inside for binoculars & camera>took several pix freehand, then rested camera securely on top of a road-reflector post for stabler\fixed shots>kept watching, shooting...and waiting for any change, etc>after 10-15 minutes we got cold & went up into cabin to download & view pix> about 10;30, we went back out to see if it was still there: at first glance it was gone, but suddenly it reappeared for several moments in same location\intensity as before, then 'winked-out' for good."
